      • getInstance

        public static Dice getInstance()

        Returns:
        instance
        Effects:
        Returns the instance of a singleton Dice.

      • setDoubleCount

        public void setDoubleCount(int count)
        Sets doubleCount with given value.
        Parameters:
        count - the value to be replaced with doubleCount
        Modifies:
        doubleCount
        Effects:
        Changes the private variable doubleCount with the parameter count. If count<0 sets doubleCount to 0, if count>3 sets doubleCount to 3.

      • getDoubleCount

        public int getDoubleCount()
        Returns doubleCount.
        Returns:
        doubleCount
        Effects:
        Returns the doubleCount field.

        public void setFaceValueSpeed(int val)
        Sets a new value to FaceValueSpeed.
        Parameters:
        val - the value to be replaced with faceValueSpeed.
        Modifies:
        faceValueSpeed
        Effects:
        Changes the private variable faceValueSpeed with val.

      • roll

        public int roll()
        Rolls the dice.
        Returns:
        faceValue1 + faceValue2 + faceValueSpeed
        Modifies:
        faceValue1, faceValue2, faceValueSpeed, doubleCount
        Effects:
        Assigns random int values to faces of the dice and increases the doubleCount if faceValue1 and faceValue2 are same and faceValueSpeed is different from them. For faceValue1 and faceValue2 assigned values are between 1 and 6 (inclusive). For faceValueSpeed assigned value is between 0 and 4 (inclusive).

      • getSum

        public int getSum()
        Returns the sum of pips from last roll.
        Returns:
        sum of pips

      • basicRoll

        public boolean basicRoll()
        Assigns random integers to faceValue 1 and faceValue2.
        Returns:
        if the last roll is double or not.
        Modifies:
        faceValue1, faceValue2
        Effects:
        Assigns random int values to faceValue1 and faceValue2. The assigned faceValue1 and faceValue2 values are between 1 and 6 (inclusive).

      • isMM

        public boolean isMM()
        Shows if Mr. Monopoly is rolled.
        Returns:
        if faceValueSpeed=0 or not.
        Effects:
        Shows if Mr. Monopoly is rolled or not at last dice roll. Mr. Monopoly is represented by faceValueSpeed = 0.

      • isBus

        public boolean isBus()
        Shows if Bus is rolled.
        Returns:
        if faceValueSpeed=4 or not.
        Effects:
        Shows if bus is rolled or not at last dice roll. Bus is represented by faceValueSpeed = 4.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Resets the double count.
        Modifies:
        doubleCount
        Effects:
        Sets the double count to 0 which is used every time a player rolls double three times in a row or a players turn ends.

      • isDouble

        public boolean isDouble()
        Shows if dice is rolled double.
        Returns:
        if faceValue1 and faceValue2 is equal and they are different from faceValueSpeed.
        Effects:
        Returns if the last dice is double, which means the faceValue1 and faceValue2 are same and they are different from faceValueSpeed.

      • isThirdDouble

        public boolean isThirdDouble()
        Shows if user rolled double three times in a row.
        Returns:
        if doubleCount is equal or greater than 3.
        Modifies:
        doubleCount (if return value of isThirdDouble() is true)
        Effects:
        Returns user rolled double three times in a row and reset the double count in case if this is true.

      • getFaceValue1

        public int getFaceValue1()
        Returns faceValue1.
        Returns:
        faceValue1

      • getFaceValue2

        public int getFaceValue2()
        Returns faceValue2.
        Returns:
        faceValue2

      • getFaceValueSpeed

        public int getFaceValueSpeed()
        Returns faceValueSpeed.
        Returns:
        faceValueSpeed

      • isEven

        public boolean isEven()
        Calculates and returns if the sum of pips of regular dices is even.
        Returns:
        if faceValue1 + faceValue2 is even.
        Effects:
        the return value determines if transit tunnel will be used.

      • getSpeedDieString

        public java.lang.String getSpeedDieString()
        Shows the dice value as String.
        Returns:
        "Mr. Monopoly, "Bus" or faceValueSpeed
        Effects:
        Shows the name of faceValueSpeed as String for gui.
